resources.string: MyNews regroups all the articles that may interest you in some determined categories.\n\nYou can receive notification on specifics articles if you enable the notification option in the notification screen.

You can touch articles to open them in a browser.

In the search screen you can search articles with specific terms or periods, dates are optional.

In the notification screen you can enable MyNews to send you a notification every day so you don't miss out any articles that interest you.
